name: ft_newton
rules: You must have validated 1 of humangl and 42cursus-humangl
description: basic Physics engine - motion - gravity - collisions

name: Inception
rules: You must have validated 1 of cub3d and minirt. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must have validated cpp-module-08 and netpractice. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: ft_transcendence
description:
Ce projet a pour but d'approfondir vos connaissances en vous faisant utiliser Docker.
 Vous allez virtualiser plusieurs images Docker en les cr√©ant dans votre nouvelle machine virtuelle personnelle.

name: minitalk
rules: You must have validated 1 of netwhat and born2beroot. You must have validated 42cursus-get_next_line and 42cursus-ft_printf. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: exam-rank-03, inception, ft_services, pipex, 42cursus-minishell, and philosophers. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert
description: The purpose of this project is to code a small data exchange program using UNIX signals. It is an introductory project for the bigger UNIX projects that will appear later on in the cursus.

name: pipex
rules: You must have validated 1 of netwhat and born2beroot. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: exam-rank-03, 42cursus-minishell, minitalk, and philosophers. You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must have validated 42cursus-ft_printf and 42cursus-get_next_line
description: This project aims to make you understand a bit deeper two concets that you already know: the redirections and the pipes. It is an introductory project for the bigger UNIX projects that will appear later on in the cursus.

name: so_long
rules: You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must have validated 42cursus-get_next_line and 42cursus-ft_printf. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: exam-rank-03, 42cursus-fdf, 42cursus-fract-ol, 42cursus-minishell, minirt, cub3d, and philosophers. You must have validated 1 of netwhat and born2beroot
description: This project is a small 2D game with minilibx. You'll learn about textures, sprites and tiles.

name: NetPractice
rules: You must not have validated any of quests 42-to-42cursus-transfert. You must have validated 42cursus-minishell and philosophers. You must not have those projects ongoing or validated: ft_irc, webserv, ft_containers, netwhat, exam-rank-05, inception, and ft_services
description: NetPractice is a general practical exercise to let you discover networking.
